name: Climb The Tower 3D
description:
Hold your fingers and start climbing, Release to fall.
Climb to the top of the tower, defeat the guards, and rescue your partners!
Upgrade the team's body and weapons.

Features:
◉ Perfect design,Full of funny.
◉ Hundreds of different levels.
◉ Full phone support.
◉ Totally free download.

Buddy Climb is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and build an invincible team of men in the universe!
